thumb.title: 曲名 : 「With You」のカタカナ表記は「**ウィズ・ユー**」
thumb.description: 動画編集 : ハック・ワスさん 動画編集アプリ : VLLOさん 歌詞の翻訳 : GoogleAiのGeminiさん 曲名 : 「With You」のカタカナ表記は「**ウィズ・ユー**」 作詞 : SUNO Ai さん ( スノAi )さん 作曲 : SUNO Ai さん ( スノAi )さん日本語タイトル翻訳 あなたと共にWith You (作成1、ゆったりムードバージョン) [Verse] I saw you at the corner store Your smile lit up the room galore Took my breath I can’t ignore Now I'm craving you for sure [Chorus] I want to be with you tonight Dancin' under neon lights Heartbeats synced they feel so right Let's vanish outta sight [Verse 2] You and me we’re like a song Perfect rhythm all night long Every time I’m feeling strong With you is where I belong [Bridge] In the city’s electric glow We forget the world below No regrets just let it flow Follow me let's steal the show [Chorus] I want to be with you tonight Dancin' under neon lights Heartbeats synced they feel so right Let's vanish outta sight [Verse 3] Through the night and past sunrise Hold me close your magic lies In your eyes no more goodbyes Together we'll improvise
